s.text: She is both progressive and proper, having made it her business to keep up with the times.
She is both progressive and proper, having made it her business to keep up with the times.
I struck up a conversation with her and was greatly annoyed when one of my friends insisted I interrupt the conversation to go have a word with him.
State Department official flossed at the table after dinner in a restaurant.
Prudie wants you to immediately regain your sense of humor and be grateful that your pal stepped in before any, uh, harm was done.
Can you recommend a general text that is current, comprehensive, and for my parents' sake, progressive?
Prudie's suggestion would be to wander into a good bookstore, online or actual, and select the most appropriate book by Letitia Baldridge.
